title: The TxturePRO Wet Brush Is the Answer to Detangling Curls
text: February 23, 2017 Courtesy of brand Growing up with curly hair meant weekly detangling sessions that almost always ended in tears and lots of shedding. They were awful. It wasn't until I was an adult that I discovered detangling combs that made my life slightly easier, but life with curls were still a bit of a struggle. But now, there's the Wet Brush TxturePro collection that allows those with curly and coiled hair even more control when styling. The TxturePRO Wet Brush collection is the perfect trifecta: Thereâ€™s a detangler brush designed to detangle and minimize hair shedding, there's an extension brush for controlling unruly hair on wigs and extensions, and a wavy toothed comb to help smooth thick, textured hair. You May Also Like Hair 10 Hairstyles That Make You Look 10 Years Younger I test drove the hair detangler on my freshly shampooed and conditioned hair earlier this week and I must say I was impressed. The bristles glided through my hair without snagging or tugging, and after my 20-minute session there wasn't a single hair on the floor. I was shocked, but the real kicker is that the brush lessened the pain that comes with removing knots and tangles; a real game changer for curly girls. More stories for the curly girls:
